name: Diep io - Tanks io Online
description:
The best game for android about tanks io.

Dive into the diep ocean of enjoyment slithering in a tank. Show your valor beating your opponents. Destroy their tanks diep!
Online tanks io battles, play with tank bots or train solo tank diep gaming!

Your cisterns are full of fuel so if somebody hit your tank it will be warm. Be a oner who is able to get to the top of the scoreboard and don't let anybody to replace you. Move as a snake among different geometrical shapes and attack your enemies. Use onscreen joystick to move your tank and second joystick to shoot other tanks. In the beginning you crawl slowly, but you can upgrade the speed and when somebody will think about shooting at you, he will see that your tank diep io already ran away.

Show your strategy in a new tankio game. Install it right now and become a master of a game.
